short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seek to parts of a movie by searching the subtitles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Subseek is a tool to search your [Plex](https://www.plex.tv/) movie subtitles for the scene you're looking for!

Once installed, you can click the Subseek button in your top menu (while watching a Plex movie) and Subseek will open up. You can then start searching for movie quotes!

Can't remember where in a movie a certain scene is, but you remember some of the movie dialog? Open up Subseek, search for the movie quote you remember and click "Seek to Scene" and the movie will jump to that part of the movie.

What if the subtitles aren't lining up with the movie file dialogue? Use the subtitle selector to try another subtitle file. Subseek will remember which subtitle you choose so you won't have to search again.
